QueryStatements.RetrieveAll: SELECT AUTO_DB.ROWID AS RECORDID, AUTO_DB.SLICENSE_TY,AUTO_DB.SREGIST, AUTO_DB.SLICENSE_TY, AUTO_DB.SREGIST, TABLE801.SDESCRIPT AS SLICENSE_TYDESC, AUTO_DB.SREGIST, AUTO_DB.SCHASSIS, AUTO_DB.SMOTOR, AUTO_DB.NYEAR, TABLE2202.SDESCRIPT AS NVESTATUSDESC, CLIENT3.SCLIENAME AS SVEH_OWNDESC, AUTO_DB.SCOLOR, TABLE2264.SDESCRIPT AS NVEHTYPEDESC, AUTO_DB.SVEHCODE, AUTO_DB.NNOTENUM FROM AUTO_DB LEFT JOIN TABLE80 TABLE801 ON TABLE801.SLICENSE_TY = AUTO_DB.SLICENSE_TY LEFT JOIN TABLE220 TABLE2202 ON TABLE2202.NVESTATUS = AUTO_DB.NVESTATUS LEFT JOIN CLIENT CLIENT3 ON CLIENT3.SCLIENT = AUTO_DB.SCLIENT LEFT JOIN TABLE226 TABLE2264 ON TABLE2264.NVEHTYPE = AUTO_DB.NVEHTYPE WHERE ((AUTO_DB.SREGIST = '[VEHÍCULO]')) ORDER BY AUTO_DB.SLICENSE_TY, AUTO_DB.SREGIST
QueryStatements.RetrieveByKey: SELECT AUTO_DB.ROWID AS RECORDID, AUTO_DB.SLICENSE_TY,AUTO_DB.SREGIST, AUTO_DB.SLICENSE_TY, AUTO_DB.SREGIST, TABLE801.SDESCRIPT AS SLICENSE_TYDESC, AUTO_DB.SREGIST, AUTO_DB.SCHASSIS, AUTO_DB.SMOTOR, AUTO_DB.NYEAR, TABLE2202.SDESCRIPT AS NVESTATUSDESC, CLIENT3.SCLIENAME AS SVEH_OWNDESC, AUTO_DB.SCOLOR, TABLE2264.SDESCRIPT AS NVEHTYPEDESC, AUTO_DB.SVEHCODE, AUTO_DB.NNOTENUM FROM AUTO_DB LEFT JOIN TABLE80 TABLE801 ON TABLE801.SLICENSE_TY = AUTO_DB.SLICENSE_TY LEFT JOIN TABLE220 TABLE2202 ON TABLE2202.NVESTATUS = AUTO_DB.NVESTATUS LEFT JOIN CLIENT CLIENT3 ON CLIENT3.SCLIENT = AUTO_DB.SCLIENT LEFT JOIN TABLE226 TABLE2264 ON TABLE2264.NVEHTYPE = AUTO_DB.NVEHTYPE WHERE AUTO_DB.SLICENSE_TY = '{SLICENSE_TY}' AND AUTO_DB.SREGIST = '{SREGIST}'

QueryStatements.RetrieveAll: SELECT DISTINCT AUTO.ROWID AS RECORDID, AUTO.SCERTYPE,AUTO.NBRANCH,AUTO.NPRODUCT,AUTO.NPOLICY,AUTO.NCERTIF,AUTO.DEFFECDATE, TABLE101.SDESCRIPT AS NBRANCHDESC, PRODMASTER2.SDESCRIPT AS NPRODUCTDESC, AUTO.NPOLICY, AUTO.NCERTIF, AUTO.NVEH_VALOR, AUTO.NPREMIUM, AUTO.NCAPITAL, AUTO.DSTARTDATE, AUTO.DEXPIRDAT, TABLE2243.SDESCRIPT AS NAUTOZONEDESC, DECODE(AUTO.SN_INFRAC, '1', 1, '2', 0, NULL, 0) AS SN_INFRAC, AUTO.DLASTCLAIM FROM AUTO LEFT JOIN TABLE10 TABLE101 ON TABLE101.NBRANCH = AUTO.NBRANCH LEFT JOIN PRODMASTER PRODMASTER2 ON PRODMASTER2.NBRANCH = AUTO.NBRANCH AND PRODMASTER2.NPRODUCT = AUTO.NPRODUCT LEFT JOIN TABLE224 TABLE2243 ON TABLE2243.NAUTOZONE = AUTO.NAUTOZONE WHERE ((AUTO.SCERTYPE = '2')) AND AUTO.SLICENSE_TY = '{SLICENSE_TY}' AND AUTO.SREGIST = '{SREGIST}' AND AUTO.DEFFECDATE <= '[RECORDEFFECTIVEDATE]' AND (AUTO.DNULLDATE IS NULL OR AUTO.DNULLDATE > '[RECORDEFFECTIVEDATE]') ORDER BY AUTO.SCERTYPE, AUTO.NBRANCH, AUTO.NPRODUCT, AUTO.NPOLICY, AUTO.NCERTIF, AUTO.DEFFECDATE
QueryStatements.RetrieveByKey: SELECT DISTINCT AUTO.ROWID AS RECORDID, AUTO.SCERTYPE,AUTO.NBRANCH,AUTO.NPRODUCT,AUTO.NPOLICY,AUTO.NCERTIF,AUTO.DEFFECDATE, TABLE101.SDESCRIPT AS NBRANCHDESC, PRODMASTER2.SDESCRIPT AS NPRODUCTDESC, AUTO.NPOLICY, AUTO.NCERTIF, AUTO.NVEH_VALOR, AUTO.NPREMIUM, AUTO.NCAPITAL, AUTO.DSTARTDATE, AUTO.DEXPIRDAT, TABLE2243.SDESCRIPT AS NAUTOZONEDESC, DECODE(AUTO.SN_INFRAC, '1', 1, '2', 0, NULL, 0) AS SN_INFRAC, AUTO.DLASTCLAIM FROM AUTO LEFT JOIN TABLE10 TABLE101 ON TABLE101.NBRANCH = AUTO.NBRANCH LEFT JOIN PRODMASTER PRODMASTER2 ON PRODMASTER2.NBRANCH = AUTO.NBRANCH AND PRODMASTER2.NPRODUCT = AUTO.NPRODUCT LEFT JOIN TABLE224 TABLE2243 ON TABLE2243.NAUTOZONE = AUTO.NAUTOZONE WHERE AUTO.SCERTYPE = '{SCERTYPE}' AND AUTO.NBRANCH = {NBRANCH} AND AUTO.NPRODUCT = {NPRODUCT} AND AUTO.NPOLICY = {NPOLICY} AND AUTO.NCERTIF = {NCERTIF} AND AUTO.DEFFECDATE = '{DEFFECDATE:D}' AND AUTO.SLICENSE_TY = '{SLICENSE_TY}' AND AUTO.SREGIST = '{SREGIST}' AND AUTO.DEFFECDATE <= '[RECORDEFFECTIVEDATE]' AND (AUTO.DNULLDATE IS NULL OR AUTO.DNULLDATE > '[RECORDEFFECTIVEDATE]')
QueryStatements.IsExist: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(*) FROM AUTO WHERE ((AUTO.SCERTYPE = '2')) AND AUTO.SLICENSE_TY = '{SLICENSE_TY}' AND AUTO.SREGIST = '{SREGIST}' AND AUTO.DEFFECDATE <= '[RECORDEFFECTIVEDATE]' AND (AUTO.DNULLDATE IS NULL OR AUTO.DNULLDATE > '[RECORDEFFECTIVEDATE]')

QueryStatements.RetrieveAll: SELECT CLAIM.ROWID AS RECORDID, CLAIM.NCLAIM, CLAIM.NCLAIM, CLAIM.NCLAIM, CLAIM_CAUS1.SDESCRIPT AS NCAUSECODDESC, TABLE1352.SDESCRIPT AS SSTACLAIMDESC, CLAIM.DOCCURDAT, CLAIM.DDECLADAT, CLAIM.NLOC_RESERV, CLAIM.NLOC_OUT_AM, CLAIM.NLOC_REC_AM, CLAIM.NLOC_PAY_AM, CLAIM.NLOC_COS_RE FROM CLAIM LEFT JOIN CLAIM_CAUS CLAIM_CAUS1 ON CLAIM_CAUS1.NBRANCH = CLAIM.NBRANCH AND CLAIM_CAUS1.NPRODUCT = CLAIM.NPRODUCT AND CLAIM_CAUS1.NCAUSECOD = CLAIM.NCAUSECOD LEFT JOIN TABLE135 TABLE1352 ON TABLE1352.SSTACLAIM = CLAIM.SSTACLAIM WHERE CLAIM.NBRANCH = {NBRANCH} AND CLAIM.NPRODUCT = {NPRODUCT} AND CLAIM.NPOLICY = {NPOLICY} AND CLAIM.NCERTIF = {NCERTIF} ORDER BY CLAIM.NCLAIM
QueryStatements.RetrieveByKey: SELECT CLAIM.ROWID AS RECORDID, CLAIM.NCLAIM, CLAIM.NCLAIM, CLAIM.NCLAIM, CLAIM_CAUS1.SDESCRIPT AS NCAUSECODDESC, TABLE1352.SDESCRIPT AS SSTACLAIMDESC, CLAIM.DOCCURDAT, CLAIM.DDECLADAT, CLAIM.NLOC_RESERV, CLAIM.NLOC_OUT_AM, CLAIM.NLOC_REC_AM, CLAIM.NLOC_PAY_AM, CLAIM.NLOC_COS_RE FROM CLAIM LEFT JOIN CLAIM_CAUS CLAIM_CAUS1 ON CLAIM_CAUS1.NBRANCH = CLAIM.NBRANCH AND CLAIM_CAUS1.NPRODUCT = CLAIM.NPRODUCT AND CLAIM_CAUS1.NCAUSECOD = CLAIM.NCAUSECOD LEFT JOIN TABLE135 TABLE1352 ON TABLE1352.SSTACLAIM = CLAIM.SSTACLAIM WHERE CLAIM.NCLAIM = {NCLAIM} AND CLAIM.NBRANCH = {NBRANCH} AND CLAIM.NPRODUCT = {NPRODUCT} AND CLAIM.NPOLICY = {NPOLICY} AND CLAIM.NCERTIF = {NCERTIF}
QueryStatements.IsExist: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLAIM WHERE CLAIM.NBRANCH = {NBRANCH} AND CLAIM.NPRODUCT = {NPRODUCT} AND CLAIM.NPOLICY = {NPOLICY} AND CLAIM.NCERTIF = {NCERTIF}

QueryStatements.RetrieveAll: SELECT CLAIM_AUTO.ROWID AS RECORDID, CLAIM_AUTO.NCLAIM,CLAIM_AUTO.NCASE_NUM,CLAIM_AUTO.NDEMAN_TYPE, CLAIM_AUTO.NCLAIM, CLAIM_AUTO.NDEMAN_TYPE, TABLE6921.SDESCRIPT AS NDEMAN_TYPEDESC, CLAIM_AUTO.NAUTO_QUANT, TABLE2042.SDESCRIPT AS NBLAMEDESC, CLAIM_AUTO.DDEMAND_DATE, TABLE2053.SDESCRIPT AS NINFRACTIONDESC, CLAIM_AUTO.SDRIVER_CLAIM, CLAIM_AUTO.SDRIVERNAME, CLAIM_AUTO.NAGE, CLAIM_AUTO.SSEXCLIEN, DECODE(CLAIM_AUTO.SALCOHOLIC, '1', 1, '2', 0, NULL, 0) AS SALCOHOLIC, DECODE(CLAIM_AUTO.SPOLICEDEM, '1', 1, '2', 0, NULL, 0) AS SPOLICEDEM, CLAIM_AUTO.DPOLDOC_DATE, CLAIM_AUTO.NPOLICEDOC, CLAIM_AUTO.SPOL_STATION, CLAIM_AUTO.NPARAGRAPH, CLAIM_AUTO.NPAGE, CLAIM_AUTO.SPOLSTAT_DEMAN, CLAIM_AUTO.SCOURT, DECODE(CLAIM_AUTO.SIND_EIR, '1', 1, '2', 0, NULL, 0) AS SIND_EIR, DECODE(CLAIM_AUTO.SSUMMARY, '1', 1, '2', 0, NULL, 0) AS SSUMMARY FROM CLAIM_AUTO LEFT JOIN TABLE692 TABLE6921 ON TABLE6921.NDEMAN_TYPE = CLAIM_AUTO.NDEMAN_TYPE LEFT JOIN TABLE204 TABLE2042 ON TABLE2042.NBLAME = CLAIM_AUTO.NBLAME LEFT JOIN TABLE205 TABLE2053 ON TABLE2053.NINFRACTION = CLAIM_AUTO.NINFRACTION WHERE CLAIM_AUTO.NCLAIM = {NCLAIM} ORDER BY CLAIM_AUTO.NCLAIM, CLAIM_AUTO.NCASE_NUM, CLAIM_AUTO.NDEMAN_TYPE
QueryStatements.RetrieveByKey: SELECT CLAIM_AUTO.ROWID AS RECORDID, CLAIM_AUTO.NCLAIM,CLAIM_AUTO.NCASE_NUM,CLAIM_AUTO.NDEMAN_TYPE, CLAIM_AUTO.NCLAIM, CLAIM_AUTO.NDEMAN_TYPE, TABLE6921.SDESCRIPT AS NDEMAN_TYPEDESC, CLAIM_AUTO.NAUTO_QUANT, TABLE2042.SDESCRIPT AS NBLAMEDESC, CLAIM_AUTO.DDEMAND_DATE, TABLE2053.SDESCRIPT AS NINFRACTIONDESC, CLAIM_AUTO.SDRIVER_CLAIM, CLAIM_AUTO.SDRIVERNAME, CLAIM_AUTO.NAGE, CLAIM_AUTO.SSEXCLIEN, DECODE(CLAIM_AUTO.SALCOHOLIC, '1', 1, '2', 0, NULL, 0) AS SALCOHOLIC, DECODE(CLAIM_AUTO.SPOLICEDEM, '1', 1, '2', 0, NULL, 0) AS SPOLICEDEM, CLAIM_AUTO.DPOLDOC_DATE, CLAIM_AUTO.NPOLICEDOC, CLAIM_AUTO.SPOL_STATION, CLAIM_AUTO.NPARAGRAPH, CLAIM_AUTO.NPAGE, CLAIM_AUTO.SPOLSTAT_DEMAN, CLAIM_AUTO.SCOURT, DECODE(CLAIM_AUTO.SIND_EIR, '1', 1, '2', 0, NULL, 0) AS SIND_EIR, DECODE(CLAIM_AUTO.SSUMMARY, '1', 1, '2', 0, NULL, 0) AS SSUMMARY FROM CLAIM_AUTO LEFT JOIN TABLE692 TABLE6921 ON TABLE6921.NDEMAN_TYPE = CLAIM_AUTO.NDEMAN_TYPE LEFT JOIN TABLE204 TABLE2042 ON TABLE2042.NBLAME = CLAIM_AUTO.NBLAME LEFT JOIN TABLE205 TABLE2053 ON TABLE2053.NINFRACTION = CLAIM_AUTO.NINFRACTION WHERE CLAIM_AUTO.NCLAIM = {NCLAIM} AND CLAIM_AUTO.NCASE_NUM = {NCASE_NUM} AND CLAIM_AUTO.NDEMAN_TYPE = {NDEMAN_TYPE}
QueryStatements.IsExist: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLAIM_AUTO WHERE CLAIM_AUTO.NCLAIM = {NCLAIM}
